channel.title: Densenet on Zhaoyu Li
channel.description: Recent content in Densenet on Zhaoyu Li

item.title: Paper note - DenseNet
item.description: Table of Contents Brief Introduction Dense Connectivity Pooling Layers Growth Rate Bottleneck Layers Compression Memory-Efficient Implementation Implementation There are two papers about DenseNet: Densely Connected Convolutional Networks Memory-Efficient Implementation of DenseNets Brief Introduction In DenseNet, there are direct connections between any two layers with the same feature-map size. This introduces $\frac{L\times(L+1)}{2}$ connections in an $L$-Layer network, instead of just $L$.
